definition: to understand/to realize/to find out
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
surname Xie
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to transport under guard

sentences.english: But first, we need to know some terminology.
sentences.chinese: 不過，我們首先需要了解一些術語。

sentences.english: We've learned more general things about parametric equations of curves.
sentences.chinese: 我們還了解了，曲線參數方程更一般的性質。

sentences.english: See the sample for more information on how to do this.
sentences.chinese: 要了解更多具體如何做的細節，請參閱樣本。

sentences.english: You should try to acquaint yourself with the facts, before you express an opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在發表看法前，你應該先了解事實真相。

sentences.english: Understanding the value of this feature requires a little backstory.
sentences.chinese: 要了解這個功能需要一點歷史知識。

sentences.english: Owner drawn controls and sub classing in WTL if you want to understand the source.
sentences.chinese: 所有者繪製控制和在WTL分級分，如果你想了解源。

sentences.english: Actually, the thing I have most difficulty understanding, is Leehom's love-life.
sentences.chinese: 其實我最難了解的，就是力宏的愛情。

sentences.english: The only guy who was hard to get to know was Richie Gaspari.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的傢伙誰是很難了解的是裏奇斯帕裏。

sentences.english: He can think like you, so he understands you.
sentences.chinese: 他可以像你一樣思考，所以他了解你。

sentences.english: The United Ns Security Council tooksanctionscontrary to the aggressor country.
sentences.chinese: 連結國安了解對侵略國採取了制裁措施。

sentences.english: Instead, check out the company' s reputation through the industry grapevine.
sentences.chinese: 與其這樣做，不如通過行業內線來了解該公司的聲譽。

sentences.english: To know how flexible to be, you have to know the market.
sentences.chinese: 想要知道自己該有多靈活，你先要了解市場。

sentences.english: Then, they will find a way to search and know that person well.
sentences.chinese: 然後，探祕將會找到能更好發掘和了解的道路。

sentences.english: By that time he already possessed a profound knowledge of Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 到這時，他對馬克思主義己經有了深刻了解。

sentences.english: But Cude says Wal-Mart has found the antidote.
sentences.chinese: 但Cude說沃爾瑪公司已經找到了解藥。

sentences.english: Upon invitation from relatives of the dead, the celestial burial master goes to investigate how the dead died.
sentences.chinese: 收到死者親屬邀請後，天葬師會去了解死者的死因。

detailed/in detail/minute

to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
